After the crossover ensemble from Germany and the AORA vocal group from Sweden, the 2024 NDHU Autumn Festival welcomes the Alex Sipiagin Jazz Quartet, composed of four top musicians from Russia.

Each member in Alex Sipiagin Jazz Quartet holds a significant position in the music worldï¼šthe world-renowned drummer, Gene Jacksonï¼›one of the top Grammy-level bassists since the early 1990s, Boris Kozlovï¼›a three-time major award winner at the Golden Melody Awards and recipient of many other accolades, pianist Yu-Ying, Shuï¼›and Alex Sipiagin, a trumpeter who made waves in the international jazz scene since the 1990s is a four-time Grammy Award winner. He also performed alongside the Gil Evans Orchestra, the George Gruntz Concert Jazz Band and others. As of 2024, Alex has released over 30 solo albums, with his latest album titled 'Live in Taiwan.'

Itâ€™s no exaggeration to say that any of these four musicians could lead a top-tier jazz band wherever they go. This time, in addition to performing together at the Taichung Jazz Festival, they are going to present a series of Alex's original works at the NDHU music hall and offer the audience an unprecedented epic auditory feast! 

See you on the evening of Tuesday, October 22nd! Let's swing to the rhythm of jazz together!
